title: "Liquid Sensors and AI Could Bring Feeling to Prosthetic Hands"
excerpt: "Humans rely heavily on sensation in their fingertips when manipulating objects. The lack of this sensation for individuals with upper limb amputations can result in objects inadvertently being dropped or crushed by a prosthetic hand."
